title: Drug Screening
author: Opentrons
description: Using this protocol, your robot can perform drug screening on a 96-well plates using 4 different drugs. Drug A will be distributed to column 1-3, drug B to column 4-6, drug C to column 7-9, and drug D to column 10-12. After 30 minutes of incubation, the robot will remove the drugs from the wells and distribute Drug E to all the wells.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will consolidate and discard solution from column 1-3, then use a new set of tips to distribute drug A to the columns.
Robot will consolidate and discard solution from column 4-6, then use a new set of tips to distribute drug B to the columns.
Robot will repeat steps 6-7 for the rest of the plate, using drug C and D.
Robot will pause for 30 minutes for incubation.
Robot will remove drug from column 1-3, then distribute drug E.
Robot will remove drug from column 4-6, then distribute drug E.
Robot will repeat steps 10-11 until the entire plate is filled with drug E.
notes:
Trough setup
 Drug A: well A1
 Drug B: well A2
 Drug C: well A3
 Drug D: well A4
* Drug E: well A5

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Drug Screening
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: Using this protocol, your robot can perform drug screening on a 96-well plates using 4 different drugs. Drug A will be distributed to column 1-3, drug B to column 4-6, drug C to column 7-9, and drug D to column 10-12. After 30 minutes of incubation, the robot will remove the drugs from the wells and distribute Drug E to all the wells.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Robot will consolidate and discard solution from column 1-3, then use a new set of tips to distribute drug A to the columns.
7. Robot will consolidate and discard solution from column 4-6, then use a new set of tips to distribute drug B to the columns.
8. Robot will repeat steps 6-7 for the rest of the plate, using drug C and D.
9. Robot will pause for 30 minutes for incubation.
10. Robot will remove drug from column 1-3, then distribute drug E.
11. Robot will remove drug from column 4-6, then distribute drug E.
12. Robot will repeat steps 10-11 until the entire plate is filled with drug E.
markdown.notes:
Trough setup
* Drug A: well A1
* Drug B: well A2
* Drug C: well A3
* Drug D: well A4
* Drug E: well A5

---

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
